name: Ichi 一 Fun Online Card Game
name_original: Ichi 一 Fun Online Card Game
description:
Ichi is a fast fast paced, Japanese themed card game that the whole family can enjoy! It's both challenging and enjoyable for any age or skill level. If you love fast, classic card games you're going to love this!

How To Play:
• Each player will receive 4 cards at the start of the game
• The objective is to get rid of all of your cards before your opponents do
• Match colors to get rid of a card
• Don't forget to click the Ichi Button with 1 card left (一) !

Features:
• Create a Username and choose an avatar
• Play against CPU
• Play against 1-3 Players online
• Up to 4 people per game
• Fast paced gameplay
• 100% Free to play!
